value:
I want to spend more time with Midia,
but...I've been only a disappointment
in that regard.

Make no mistake: I am sworn to
Princess Nyna—not the crown!

A proper soldier must not act rashly.
You must take breaks and prepare for
what comes. That is your duty.

Even within these walls, one should
not grow idle. There are many faces
here; an enemy could easily slip in...

A body lacking training grows soft
before long. For Archanea, I must
continue training every day.

I am Astram. I come with a greeting.
You must be $Nu.

Bear witness to the technique of
Archanea's hero, Astram!
I mustn't grow complacent!
So much left to learn...
I will repay this debt. I swear it.

I am Astram. I fight for justice in the
name of Archanea! ...Who are you?

Long ago, when I was first called
heroic, I made a vow on my sword:
I will be ever loyal and ever just.$k$pNow, finding myself in this world,
my vow remains, and I feel at home
knowing you are as driven as I.$k$pI look on the people of Askr, and
I am reminded of my friends Jeorge
and Midia... Honest, stalwart folk.$k$pYet, the more stalwart, the greater
possibility of conflict...$k$pRemember that should it ever
seem opportune for you to turn
against Archanea.$k$pFor Mercurius and I will cleanse the
wicked from this world and any other!
...Should the time ever come, I mean.
でやあっ
I won't let you get away!
ぐっ…
Impossible...!
We will triumph!
You will never win!
You've forced my hand.
Heads will roll.
Midia...
Hmph.
I am Astram, captain of Archanea's free company.
Hm?! Enough japery!
There is nothing my Mercurius cannot cut. Care to see for yourself?
No one knows me better than Jeorge. He and I—we've been through a lot together.
My allegiance lies with Princess Nyna and Archanea—and with them above all.
I long the day I can spend time together with Midia...away from the training grounds.
You have my full strength at your disposal.
Very well, then.
Never a doubt.
I will fight!
